description.narrative: The objective of this course is to train user and technician level personnel in the effective use of x-ray systems so that they can more effectively target, locate and interdict contraband. The course explains and demonstrates the differences in current x-ray systems and the most effective uses of each in identifying anomalies.

description.narrative: AMO traveled to SEMAR in Mexico City. AMO had a subject matter expertise exchange with SEMARs specialized unit that is responsible for the extraction of information from drones. AMO accessed their current capabilities to determine the proper training to allow them to be more sufficient. This is a 2 part engagement. The second part will occur in march or april of 2024.
